resources.link_description: Deep Learning Summer School 2016 Video Lectures
resources.description: A set of 1-2 hour introductory lectures by impressive people.

resources.link_description: The Goodfellow et al. Deep Learning book
resources.description: A nice comprehensive textbook about modern deep learning.

resources.link_description: A Udacity MOOC by Vincent Vanhoucke
resources.description: Vincent Vanhoucke from Google did a pretty good MOOC on Deep Learning with TensorFlow.

resources.link_description: Yoav Goldberg's "A Primer on Neural Network Models for Natural Language Processing"
resources.description: The lay of the land of NNs for NLP in late 2015.

resources.link_description: Course lectures by Nando de Freitas
resources.description: Nando de Freitas (from Oxford and DeepMind) gave some pretty nice lectures about deep learning with Torch.
A great set of blog posts with visualizations for intuition.
